<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// An RAII helper object ensure that the unique lock file is removed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Ensures that if there is an error or a signal before we finish acquiring the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// lock, the unique file will be removed. And if we successfully take the lock,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the signal handler is left in place so that signals while the lock is held</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// will remove the unique lock file. The caller should ensure there is a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// matching call to sys::DontRemoveFileOnSignal when the lock is released.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-lockfilemanager-cpp-/removeuniquelockfileonsignal"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-lockfilemanager-cpp-/removeuniquelockfileonsignal/#a2808d6ab8eaca1641b199df415589d0c">RemoveUniqueLockFileOnSignal</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Someone else managed to create the lock file first. Read the process ID</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// from the lock file.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((Owner = readLockFile(LockFileName))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Wipe out our unique lock file (it&#39;s useless now)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#a921e0b01f22f9a37012450f9b5f0ccb7">sys::fs::remove</a>(UniqueLockFileName);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#a645a607ffcccb12f16a5736db991e7d9">sys::fs::exists</a>(LockFileName)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The previous owner released the lock file before we could read it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to get ownership again.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There is a lock file that nobody owns; try to clean it up and get</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ownership.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((EC = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#a921e0b01f22f9a37012450f9b5f0ccb7">sys::fs::remove</a>(LockFileName))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::string S(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;failed to remove lockfile &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">      S.append(std::string(UniqueLockFileName));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lockfilemanager/#a5c1d619b63ed612ce3102028fb6940af">setError</a>(EC, S);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lockfilemanager/#ae2a81443bc8265b761544ed8d58cd391"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lockfilemanager/#a1fcefc1a8c747197b9ee8b5e99d732fc">LockFileManager::LockFileState</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lockfilemanager/#ae2a81443bc8265b761544ed8d58cd391">LockFileManager::getState</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Owner)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lockfilemanager/#a1fcefc1a8c747197b9ee8b5e99d732fcabfd64c399ca341b115a17cf25bf161a2">LFS&#95;Shared</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ErrorCode) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since we own the lock, remove the lock file and our own unique lock file.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#a921e0b01f22f9a37012450f9b5f0ccb7">sys::fs::remove</a>(LockFileName);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#a921e0b01f22f9a37012450f9b5f0ccb7">sys::fs::remove</a>(UniqueLockFileName);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The unique file is now gone, so remove it from the signal handler. This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// matches a sys::RemoveFileOnSignal() in LockFileManager().</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lockfilemanager/#ae2a81443bc8265b761544ed8d58cd391">getState</a>() != <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lockfilemanager/#a1fcefc1a8c747197b9ee8b5e99d732fcabfd64c399ca341b115a17cf25bf161a2">LFS&#95;Shared</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lockfilemanager/#a9973b06ec4b8e2f93a9308b85c1b8b30a213a07aec4e7e7d016b3bd594daf9cc5">Res&#95;Success</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since we don&#39;t yet have an event-based method to wait for the lock file,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// use randomized exponential backoff, similar to Ethernet collision</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// algorithm. This improves performance on machines with high core counts</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// when the file lock is heavily contended by multiple clang processes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight">std::chrono&#95;literals;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/exponentialbackoff">ExponentialBackoff</a> Backoff(std::chrono::seconds(MaxSeconds), 10ms, 500ms);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Wait first as this is only called when the lock is known to be held.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Backoff.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/exponentialbackoff/#a2e8404047337057e4fff7e416f28ce3b">waitForNextAttempt</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: implement event-based waiting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#a592297dd80c13e993380e2bf972721ac">sys::fs::access</a>(LockFileName.c&#95;str(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#ab3cde71d019a4b19046fa286973656ebadd7f7c3323353f547eb98a8efba37ed0">sys::fs::AccessMode::Exist</a>) ==</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a59739a4f15fb2ec57a6b7fcfe938546ba2e70fc89b08f26fa3fc77694c91e8f7a">errc::no&#95;such&#95;file&#95;or&#95;directory</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the original file wasn&#39;t created, somone thought the lock was dead.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#a645a607ffcccb12f16a5736db991e7d9">sys::fs::exists</a>(FileName))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lockfilemanager/#a9973b06ec4b8e2f93a9308b85c1b8b30ae933c5a1f2e505b61d59df1e3937adef">Res&#95;OwnerDied</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lockfilemanager/#a9973b06ec4b8e2f93a9308b85c1b8b30a213a07aec4e7e7d016b3bd594daf9cc5">Res&#95;Success</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the process owning the lock died without cleaning up, just bail out.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!processStillExecuting((&#42;Owner).first, (&#42;Owner).second))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lockfilemanager/#a9973b06ec4b8e2f93a9308b85c1b8b30ae933c5a1f2e505b61d59df1e3937adef">Res&#95;OwnerDied</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Give up.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lockfilemanager/#a9973b06ec4b8e2f93a9308b85c1b8b30a2b00d68ed92fa7423fd1e18f31945d53">Res&#95;Timeout</a>;</span></CodeLine>
